title: Chemo Induced Insanity
description: Chemo Induced Insanity is a collection of ramblings of a 37 year old Breast Cancer survivor. She takes you through the sometimes serious effects of chemotherapy and cancer. She then makes you laugh until your grabbing for tissues at the craziness of it all. She lets us know that cancer is just a speed bump in life and that God and Faith is our shining knight in armor.
author: Carol A. Goad
